config_description: Cannot found this configuration description for this configuration.
developer_understanding_on_working: The configuration 'gi.igi.samples' is used in the code to set the number of photons for InstantGI. It retrieves the integer value associated with 'gi.igi.samples' from the Options object passed to the InstantGI constructor.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The triggering frequency of the 'gi.igi.samples' configuration depends on when an InstantGI object is created with the Options object that contains this configuration. The frequency would vary based on how often InstantGI objects are instantiated in the system.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: The impact of the 'gi.igi.samples' configuration option is on the quality of global illumination in the system. A higher number of photons can result in better quality but may also increase computation time and memory usage.
